CodeEditorModel.Text:
'IAG Code behind - Add local subroutines for the IAG.
Sub OnUpdate
Select Case MyState.Value Case THE.eState.Clearing ColorRectangle=True
Case THE.eState.Stopped ColorRectangle=False
Case THE.eState.Starting ColorRectangle=True
Case THE.eState.Idle ColorRectangle=False
Case THE.eState.Suspended ColorRectangle=False
Case THE.eState.Execute ColorRectangle=False
Case THE.eState.Stopping ColorRectangle=True
Case THE.eState.Aborting ColorRectangle=True
Case THE.eState.Aborted ColorRectangle=False
Case THE.eState.Holding ColorRectangle=True
Case THE.eState.Held ColorRectangle=False
Case THE.eState.UnHolding ColorRectangle=True
Case THE.eState.Suspending ColorRectangle=True
Case THE.eState.UnSuspending ColorRectangle=True
Case THE.eState.Resetting ColorRectangle=True
Case THE.eState.Complete ColorRectangle=False End Select
End Sub
